meanings.sent1: The upgoing balloon floated higher and higher in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The stairs were upgoing, leading us to the top of the tower.
meanings.sent3: The upgoing elevator made everyone feel like they were on a magical ride.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were upgoing, lifting her out of the sadness.
meanings.sent5: The upgoing rocket left a trail of smoke as it shot towards the stars.

meanings.definition: Ascending or increasing in value or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The upgoing prices of houses made it difficult for young couples to buy a home.
meanings.sent2: His upgoing grades showed his hard work and dedication to his studies.
meanings.sent3: The upgoing thermometer made everyone sweat in the hot summer sun.
meanings.sent4: Her upgoing excitement for the concert grew with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The upgoing cheers from the crowd motivated the team to play even harder.
